pixelmon.config.title: Pixelmon Config
pixelmon.config.scaleGrassBattles: Scale grass battle levels to player
pixelmon.config.eventHasLegendaries: Allow Legendaries in event Poké Gifts
pixelmon.config.awardPhotos: Award photos to wild battle winners
pixelmon.config.returnHeldItems: Return held items after PvP battles
pixelmon.config.engagePlayerByPokeBall: Enable challenge by throwing Poké Ball
pixelmon.config.allowEventMoveTutors: Allow event move tutors to spawn
pixelmon.config.useSystemTimeForWorldTim: Use system time for world time
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesDrop: Use external JSON files for drops
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesMove: Use external JSON files for moves
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesNPCs: Use external JSON files for NPCs
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesRule: Use external JSON files for battle rules
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesSpaw: Use external JSON files for spawning
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesStat: Use external JSON files for stats
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesStru: Use external JSON files for structures
pixelmon.config.maximumSpawnedPokemon.co: The maximum number of Pokémon that can be naturally spawned in at once. This does not count fishing, external moves, commands, or legendary spawning.
pixelmon.config.spawning.comment: Settings that control what Pokemon spawns and how many of them spawn.
pixelmon.config.gens.comment: These values set whether or not a Generation's Pokemon will be spawned.
pixelmon.config.pokeloot.comment: Settings for controlling PokeLoot chest spawns and behavior.
pixelmon.config.afkhandler.comment: Settings for controlling the auto-battler for AFK players.
pixelmon.config.awardPhotos.comment: Award photos to players who defeat wild Pokemon.
pixelmon.config.wildCanFlee.comment: Wild Pokemon will have a chance based on unfavourable battle conditions to try and flee from battle.
pixelmon.config.spawnStructures.comment: Allow random generation of structures such as Pokemon Centers, shrines, and other buildings if true.
pixelmon.config.allowPokemonNicknames.co: Allow the player to nickname Pokemon (not a server-wide setting, just a client setting).
Allow the anvil to replace finished items with starting item from player's inventory without manual placing.
pixelmon.config.allowVanillaMobs.comment: Allow creepers, skeletons, etc. to spawn in the world. DANGER - can kill you while battling.
pixelmon.config.allowCaptureOutsideBattl: Allow player to throw Poke Balls from hotbar. If false, Poke Balls can only be thrown in battles.
pixelmon.config.namePlateRange.comment: Sets how far Pokemon names and levels can be seen from (client setting only). 1=Default, 2=Farther, 3=Far
pixelmon.config.showWildNames.comment: Whether to show wild Pokémon names on their nameplates.
pixelmon.config.scalePokemonModels.comme: Increases size of Pokemon models in-game by 30%.
pixelmon.config.growthScaleModifier.comm: Adjusts the variation in size caused by growth (0-2). 1 is normal.
pixelmon.config.pokemonDropsEnabled.comm: Allows wild Pokemon to drop items like feathers, etc. on death.
pixelmon.config.printErrors.comment: Prints more detailed error messages to the server.log file if enabled.
pixelmon.config.allowRiding.comment: Allow players to ride Pokemon. If false, no Pokemon can be ridden (server-side option).
pixelmon.config.allowPlanting.comment: Allow players to plant Apricorns in the ground.
pixelmon.config.maximumPlants.comment: The maximum plants allowed within a chunk. Applies to Apricorns and Berries.
pixelmon.config.movesPerTutor.comment: The amount of moves a move Tutor will have
pixelmon.config.allowPvPExperience.comme: Determines if player vs. player battles give Pokemon experience. No EXP gain in PvP when false.
pixelmon.config.allowTrainerExperience.c: Determines if player vs. Trainer battles give Pokemon experience. No EXP gain in Trainer when false.
pixelmon.config.returnHeldItems.comment: If enabled, consumable held items will be returned to Pokémon at the end of player vs. player battles.
pixelmon.config.forceEndBattleResult.com: What will happen if a battle is force-ended without a proper conclusion. 0: A winner is determined based on the number of remaining Pokémon (with % HP as a tiebreaker). 1: The battle is considered a draw. 2: The battle is considered abnormally ended.
pixelmon.config.engagePlayerByPokeBall.c: If enabled, players will be able to challenge others by throwing a Pokemon at the enemy player rather than a Pokemon.
pixelmon.config.computerBoxes.comment: Sets the amount of boxes players have in their PCs (capped at 256 per player).
pixelmon.config.enableWildAggression.com: Allow wild Pokemon to initiate battles.
pixelmon.config.allowRareCandyCrafting.c: Allows players to make Rare Candies by crafting (server-side option).
pixelmon.config.allowTMReuse.comment: If enabled, TMs are reusable. If disabled, TMs are consumed upon use.
pixelmon.config.writeEntitiesToWorld.com: Saves Pixelmon entities to file when world saves (greatly increases save file size and save time if true). Required for the morph mod.
pixelmon.config.spawnBirdShrines.comment: Allow Legendary bird shrines to spawn randomly in world.
pixelmon.config.spawnGemShrines.comment: Allow Spectral Jeweller Gem shrines to spawn randomly in world.
pixelmon.config.reusableBirdShrines.comm: Set Legendary shrines to one use (false) or multiple use (true).
pixelmon.config.spawnersOpOnly.comment: If true, must be opped to use spawners. If false, must be in Creative mode.
pixelmon.config.needHMToRide.comment: Requires flying and water Pokemon mounts to have HM moves Fly or Surf (respectively) to be able to ride them.
pixelmon.config.cloningMachineEnabled.co: Allow players to use cloning machines to clone Mew into Mewtwo.
pixelmon.config.lakeTrioMaxEnchants.comm: Sets The number of times a Azelf, Mesprit and Uxie can enchant a ruby.
pixelmon.config.tradersReusable.comment: Set traders to one use (false) or multiple use (true).
pixelmon.config.allowGemCrafting.comment: Allows the 17 types of Gems to be crafted by players.
pixelmon.config.allowEventMoveTutors.com: Allows move tutors that teach event moves to spawn naturally.
pixelmon.config.useCustomTabList.comment: Allows you to toggle which tab list you would like to use. True for Pixelmon's, false for vanilla's.
pixelmon.config.starterOnJoin.comment: Lets you choose to give/not give a starter to a player on join (via the Pixelmon starter screen).
pixelmon.config.enablePointToSteer.comme: When mounted, enables steering the Pokemon by looking.
pixelmon.config.useSystemTimeForWorldTim: Lets your world follow real world time or not (uses the server's system clock).
pixelmon.config.systemTimeSyncInterval.c: The time taken before syncing to the system clock (in seconds).
pixelmon.config.enablePokedexWikiWebsite: Allows the Pokedex to open wiki pages. Turn this off if you don't want the wiki opening from inside Pixelmon.
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFiles.com: Load external configuration files from the "pixelmon" folder. If set to true and the "pixelmon" folder does not exist, Pixelmon will create the folder and dump the existing files there. This option will no longer be used as there are more precise options like useExternalJSONFilesDrop available.
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesDrop: Load external configuration files used for drops from the "pixelmon/drops" folder. If set to true and the "pixelmon/drops" folder does not exist, Pixelmon will create the folder and dump the existing files there.
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesNPCs: Load external configuration files used for NPCs from the "pixelmon/npcs" folder. If set to true and the "pixelmon/npcs" folder does not exist, Pixelmon will create the folder and dump the existing files there.
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesRule: Load external configuration files used for battle rules from the "pixelmon/rules" folder. If set to true and the "pixelmon/rules" folder does not exist, Pixelmon will create the folder and dump the existing files there.
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesSpaw: Load external configuration files used for spawning from the "pixelmon/spawning" folder. If set to true and the "pixelmon/spawning" folder does not exist, Pixelmon will create the folder and dump the existing files there.
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesStat: Load external configuration files used for stats from the "pixelmon/stats" folder. If set to true and the "pixelmon/stats" folder does not exist, Pixelmon will create the folder and dump the existing files there.
pixelmon.config.useExternalJSONFilesStru: Load external configuration files used for structures from the "pixelmon/structures" folder. If set to true and the "pixelmon/structures" folder does not exist, Pixelmon will create the folder and dump the existing files there.
pixelmon.config.chunkSpawnRadius.comment: The radius in chunks around a player that Pokemon can spawn within.
pixelmon.config.battleAIDescription: 1: Choose moves randomly. 2: Choose the most damaging move possible (with type match-ups), ignoring status moves. 3: Use both offensive and status moves.
pixelmon.config.battleAIDescriptionAdvan: 4: Use all moves intelligently and switch out when advantageous.
pixelmon.config.battleAIWild.comment: The type of AI to use for wild Pokemon in battle. \n1: Choose moves randomly. 2: Choose the most damaging move possible (with type match-ups), ignoring status moves. 3: Use both offensive and status moves.
pixelmon.config.battleAIBoss.comment: The type of AI to use for boss Pokemon in battle. \n1: Choose moves randomly. 2: Choose the most damaging move possible (with type match-ups), ignoring status moves. 3: Use both offensive and status moves.
pixelmon.config.battleAITrainer.comment: The type of AI to use for NPC Trainers in battle. \n1: Choose moves randomly. 2: Choose the most damaging move possible (with type match-ups), ignoring status moves. 3: Use both offensive and status moves. 4: Use all moves intelligently and switch out when advantageous.
pixelmon.config.expModifier.comment: Multiplier for experience gained in Pokemon battles.
pixelmon.config.multiplePhotosOfSamePoke: Allow each player to take multiple photos of the same Pokémon.
pixelmon.config.allowMoneyMultipliers.co: Allow Pay Day to award PokéDollars when used.
pixelmon.config.pickupRate.comment: Chance of the Pickup Ability picking up an item after a battle (1/rate). 0 disables this.
pixelmon.config.bedsHealPokemon.comment: Whether sleeping in a bed heals a player's Pokemon.
pixelmon.config.useBattleCamera.comment: Set whether or not to switch to an external camera during battles.
pixelmon.config.playerControlCamera.comm: Set whether or not the player can control the camera during battles (sets to sphere based camera positioning)
pixelmon.config.allowPokemonEditors.comm: Server-side, whether players can use Pokémon editors. Client-side, whether other players can use a Pokémon editor on the player with the setting.
pixelmon.config.dataSaveOnWorldSave.comm: If players party and computer are forcefully saved upon every world save (If false, you should be saving data via /saveall, or risk data loss)
pixelmon.config.maxLevel.comment: The maximum level that a Pokémon can be.
pixelmon.config.useDropGUI.comment: Whether to display a GUI with Pokémon drops after defeating a regular Pokémon.
pixelmon.config.ridingSpeedMultiplier.co: Multipier for the speed that mounted Pokémon travel at. Can be between 0 and 1.
pixelmon.config.berryTreeGrowthMultiplie: Multipier for the speed at which berry trees grow. Can be between 0.1 and 1000.
pixelmon.config.alwaysHaveMegaRing.comme: Whether or not players will automatically have a Mega ring.
pixelmon.config.spawnTickRate.comment: Number of ticks before an attempt to spawn entities is made.
pixelmon.config.spawnDimensions.comment: List of dimensions that Pokemon will spawn in.
pixelmon.config.shinySpawnRate.comment: Shiny calculation uses 1/(Shiny rate) to get odds of becoming Shiny.
pixelmon.config.bossSpawnTicks.comment: Average number of ticks before spawning a boss Pokémon
pixelmon.config.legendarySpawnTicks.comm: Average number of ticks before an attempt at Legendary spawning will be made (modified by spawn chance).
pixelmon.config.legendaryRepeatSpawnTick: Minimum number of ticks before a particular legendary can spawn again (via main spawner).
pixelmon.config.legendarySpawnChance.com: Chance that a Legendary spawn attempt will succeed (0-1).
pixelmon.config.hiddenAbilitySpawnRate.c: Chance of a wild Pokemon spawning with its hidden Ability (1/rate). 0 disables hidden Ability spawns.
pixelmon.config.allowLegendarySpawn.comm: Allow wild Legendaries to spawn (besides specific event spawns).
pixelmon.config.displayLegendaryGlobalMe: Displays server-wide announcement 'A Legendary has spawned in <name> biome' when a Legendary spawns.
pixelmon.config.replaceMCVillagers.comme: Replaces Minecraft's villagers with Pixelmon NPCs.
pixelmon.config.spawnPokeMarts.comment: Poke Marts will spawn with shopkeepers in Minecraft's towns.
pixelmon.config.increaseVillageSpawnRate: Increase the Minecraft village spawn rate by 100%.
pixelmon.config.useRecentLevelMoves.comm: If true, Pokémon will spawn with the most recent moves in their level-up movepools. If false, Pokémon will spawn with random moves from their level-up movepools.
pixelmon.config.spawnGyms.comment: Sets spawning of Gyms in close proximity to newly generated towns on or off.
pixelmon.config.spawnLevelsByDistance.co: Sets whether or not Pokemon levels are determined by distance from the World's spawn point.
pixelmon.config.maxLevelByDistance.comme: Maximum level Pokemon will spawn at when Spawn Levels By Distance enabled.
pixelmon.config.distancePerLevel.comment: Number of blocks for a level increase when Spawn Levels By Distance enabled.
pixelmon.config.maxLandPokemon.comment: Max number of land Pokemon at one time.
pixelmon.config.maxUndergroundPokemon.co: Max number of underground Pokemon at one time.
pixelmon.config.maxWaterPokemon.comment: Max number of water Pokemon at one time.
pixelmon.config.maxFlyingPokemon.comment: Max number of flying Pokemon at one time (keep this low).
pixelmon.config.maxNumNPCs.comment: Max number of NPCs at one time.
pixelmon.config.maxNumBosses.comment: Max number of bosses at one time.
pixelmon.config.caveMaxMultiplier.commen: Multiplies the level of a wild Pokémon based on how far underground it spawned. Defines the highest number the multiplier can be at y = 0.
pixelmon.config.despawnOnFleeOrLoss.comm: Forces wild Pokemon to despawn after a battle.
pixelmon.config.spawnNormal.comment: Allows normal visible PokeChests to spawn around the world randomly.
pixelmon.config.spawnHidden.comment: Allows invisible PokeChests to spawn around the world randomly.
pixelmon.config.spawnGrotto.comment: Allow Hidden Grottos to spawn in the world.
pixelmon.config.spawnRate.comment: Chest spawn rate. 0: 1 per 64 chunks. 1: 1 per 32 chunks. 2: 1 per 18 chunks. 3: 1 per 10 chunks
pixelmon.config.spawnMode.comment: Default spawn mode (FCFS=0, PL1D=1, PUD=2, TIMED=3). FCFS = First Come First Serve, only one player can loot chest, then chests vanishes. PL1D = Player 1 Drop, chest gives one drop per person. Chest remains for others to use once each. PUD = Player Unlimited Drops, chests can be used infinitely by all players. TIMED = Each player allowed to loot again after specified time interval (individual timers). Chest remains after looting.
pixelmon.config.timedLootReuseHours.comm: Sets frequency (hours) that a player can reuse a timed loot chest (both placed in Creative and naturally spawned) if set to TIMED.
pixelmon.config.enableAFKHandler.comment: Have auto-battle take over if the player is AFK during a battle. Activates after the specified time period and gives specified time for each turn after that.
pixelmon.config.afkActivateSeconds.comme: The time in seconds before a player in a battle is declared to be AFK and the auto-battle code takes over for them.
pixelmon.config.afkHandlerTurnSeconds.co: The time in seconds before the auto-battle handler picks a move automatically each turn.
pixelmon.config.renderDistanceWeight.com: Multiplier of the 64 distance usually used for rendering.
pixelmon.config.lowResTextures.comment: Use the low resolution textures for Pokemon and Poke Balls. Useful for low-end systems.
pixelmon.config.useSmoothShadingOnPokeBa: Use the SMD normal maps for shading Poke Balls.
pixelmon.config.useSmoothShadingOnPokemo: Use the SMD normal maps for shading Pokemon.
pixelmon.config.useOriginalPokemonTextur: Use the original Pokemon textures for statues.
Display the currently selected Pokemon's attack target on the screen.
pixelmon.config.drawHealthBars.comment: Show each Pokemon's health in a bar above their heads.
pixelmon.config.allowBreeding.comment: Allows the placement of ranch blocks, which are required for breeding Pokemon.
Allows two Ditto to breed together to produce Eggs with random Pokémon inside.
pixelmon.config.allowRandomBreedingEggsT: Enable random Eggs from Ditto-Ditto breeding to contain Legendaries.
pixelmon.config.allowRandomSpawnedEggsTo: Enables random Eggs from /pokegiveegg to contain Legendaries.
pixelmon.config.allowRanchCrafting.comme: Allow the crafting of ranch blocks.
pixelmon.config.useBreedingEnvironment.c: Control speed of breeding based on the blocks set in the area. If false, will set breeding speed to 1.0x.
pixelmon.config.breedingEnvironmentCheck: Seconds between running the environment check for breeders, requires useBreedingEnvironment to be enabled
pixelmon.config.stepsPerEggCycle.comment: Sets the number of steps per Egg cycle. Lower numbers hatch Eggs faster.
pixelmon.config.numBreedingStages.commen: Number of stages to go through before breeding occurs (1-5).
pixelmon.config.breedingTicks.comment: Number of world ticks needed to increase the breeding stage.
pixelmon.config.allowExternalMoves.comme: Allows the use of external moves such as Rock Smash and Cut.
pixelmon.config.allowDestructiveExternal: Allow destructive external moves (includes Cut, Dig, Explode, LightFire, Lightning, RockSmash)
pixelmon.config.saveToExternalDatabase.c: Enable this to change the save system over to a database specified in the connection string property. Deprecated do NOT use!
pixelmon.config.connectionString.comment: Put the connection string for the external database in the form jdbc:dbtype://...
pixelmon.config.removeVanillaMusic.comme: Whether to remove Minecraft music and only play Pixelmon music in-game.
pixelmon.config.minMusicDelay.comment: Minimum number of world ticks before a new music track will start.
pixelmon.config.maxMusicDelay.comment: Maximum number of world ticks before a new music track will start.
pixelmon.config.scaleGrassBattles.commen: Scale grass battles to players' team levels?
pixelmon.config.blocksHaveLegendaries.co: Allows Legendaries to spawn from blocks (i.e., grass).
pixelmon.config.pokeGiftReusable.comment: Enable multiple players to get the Pokemon from the gift.
pixelmon.config.pokeGiftHaveEvents.comme: Allows Poke Gifts to be used (both placing and using, prevention against spam).
pixelmon.config.eventPokeGiftLoad.commen: Should an event Poke Gift spawn?
pixelmon.config.eventHasLegendaries.comm: Enable/Disable Legendaries from being added to the event Poke Gift.
pixelmon.config.eventHasShinies.comment: Each Pokemon has a 1/10 chance of being a Shiny.
pixelmon.config.eventMaxPokemon.comment: Sets the maximum amount of Pokemon that are in spawned Poke Gifts.
pixelmon.config.eventShinyRate.comment: The rate of Shiny Pokemon appearing in a Poke Gift (1/x).
pixelmon.config.eventTime.comment: Define a custom date for Poke Gift events (day then month).
pixelmon.config.eventCoords.comment: Specify the coordinates of the event Poke Gift chest here.
pixelmon.config.elevatorSearchRange.comm: Maximum search range up/down for a pairing elevator.
pixelmon.config.despawnRadius.comment: The minimum number of blocks away from the nearest player a Pokémon can be when despawned.
pixelmon.config.entitiesPerPlayer.commen: The maximum number of entities (NPC or Pokémon) that can spawn per player. Lower for better performance.
pixelmon.config.horizontalSliceRadius.co: The horizontal radius of the areas randomly selected near the player to do spawning in. Lower for better performance but less reliable spawning.
pixelmon.config.horizontalTrackFactor.co: How many ticks 'lead' the player tracking spawner will give players based on their motion. This tries to spawn at locations the player is about to be.
pixelmon.config.maximumDistanceFromCentr: The maximum distance from the player that entities may spawn.
pixelmon.config.minimumDistanceBetweenSp: The minimum number of blocks between a spawned entity and an existing living entity.
pixelmon.config.minimumDistanceFromCentr: The minimum distance from the player that entities may spawn. The lower this is, the closer entities will spawn to players.
pixelmon.config.spawnFrequency.comment: The number of spawn passes made per minute. Decrease for better performance.
pixelmon.config.spawnSetFolder.comment: Which folder to use under ./pixelmon/spawning/ for spawn sets.
pixelmon.config.spawnsPerPass.comment: The maximum number of spawns in a single spawn cycle for a single player. Lower for slower spawning and better performance.
pixelmon.config.useBetaSpawner.comment: Whether or not to use the new spawning system.
pixelmon.config.verticalSliceRadius.comm: The vertical radius of the areas randomly selected near the player to do spawning in. Lower for better performance but less reliable spawning. Larger than horizontal to better match player behavior.
pixelmon.config.verticalTrackFactor.comm: How many ticks 'lead' the player tracking spawner will give players based on their vertical motion. Typically best as zero due to the interference jumping can cause.
pixelmon.config.maxSpawnsPerTick.comment: The maximum number of spawn events (not number of Pokémon) that can spawn in a single tick
pixelmon.config.canPokemonBeHit.comment: Whether or not out-of-battle wild Pokémon can be hurt by physical attacks.
pixelmon.config.bossRate.comment: The rate of boss Pokémon in the wild (1/x) not including mega bosses.
pixelmon.config.storage.comment: Storage settings for party and computer data.
pixelmon.config.useAsyncSaving.comment: Activates off-main thread saving of party and computer data. (server only)
pixelmon.config.asyncInterval.comment: The interval in seconds that the async saver will save all queued data to disk.

pixelmon.config.pokerus.comment: All sort of settings regarding Pokérus.
pixelmon.config.pkrsEnabled.comment: Whether or not the Pokérus is enabled. This blocks the growth, the spread and the spawning of the Pokérus.
pixelmon.config.pkrsInformPlayers.commen: Whether or not the player should be informed if their Pokémon got Pokérus.
pixelmon.config.pkrsSpreadRate.comment: Chance to spread the Pokérus to the near Pokémon after a battle. (1/x) (-1 to disable; 0 to keep always active)
pokerus.message.informPrefix: The healer dings at you, and an automated message plays.
pokerus.message.inform1: Your Pokémon appear to have been infected by Pokérus, a microscopic life-form that we do not know much about just yet.
pokerus.message.inform2: It spreads quickly, but does not seem to cause any harm.
pokerus.message.inform3: It has, on occasion, even proven to be beneficial to a Pokémon's growth, though infections seem to be short-lived.
